channel.title: Best Half-Life or Half-Life Source mod?
channel.description:
I'm wanting to replay Half-Life one but want a visual boost. Does anyone have any suggestions for the BEST high poly count, hi res texture, or just the best overall HD mod that will hold me over till Black Mesa is released? I have both the original and source so it could be a mod for either one. Thanks for all who help! Drakey83
P.S. I know there are countless other threads about this same question but I want an updated list.

item.title: Best Half-Life or Half-Life Source mod?
item.dc:creator: Ry_amp_955_n
item.description:
deadlife101:

accually HL gold is just the PS2 version of HL with different textures and more bugs.

Read full topic
item.source: Best Half-Life or Half-Life Source mod?

item.title: Best Half-Life or Half-Life Source mod?
item.dc:creator: Drakey83
item.description:
Jack Freeman:

I recommend HL Gold for vanilla HL. But for source i would recommend Half-Life: Source Enhanced mod With HLS Enhanced shaders.

Thanks for the info, I’m using this now. The only thing I cant figure out is how to get the enhanced shaders to work. Once I drop them in the folder HLS freezes when I boot it up.

Read full topic

item.title: Best Half-Life or Half-Life Source mod?
item.dc:creator: Power_Dust
item.description:
I’d play the original Half-Life and when Black Mesa is released I’ll play that to be even more astonished of the visual difference. Maybe you can bypass the time until Black Mesa by playing the mod “Sweet Half-Life”, I think it is the best one for Half-Life I have played.
